```{r oddcount, echo = TRUE}
oddcount <- function(x) {
    k <- 0
    for (n in x) {
        if (n %% 2 == 1) k <- k+1
    }
    return(k)
}
```

```{r}
oddcount(c(1, 2, 3, 5, 7, 10))
```
